column4: Okay, I just left the room about 30 mins ago, and I just came in to find 2 search for files windows open. One is empty, the other has results being a Restore folder, with a long number, mount point manager remote database, and tracking.log. My firewall detects no hits. Have I been breached?
not that likely - what do you have set to run in cron?
are the windows at command prompt?
hmm - strange...I do not have a clue and I cannot see them... :(
I am very curious to see the screencap
the bigger win looks like you were trying to open a file in some app and it was getting the particulars
possible - were you impatient at something?
oh and that guy on the wallpaper is ugly....
it looks like the back window is the parent - what is it?
frankly, i think you should blow away the bigger win and see what happens to the back one - it does not look dangerous - looks like a mouse slip....
garbage from some mouse slip i think
i do not know how tightly you manage ff and java/javascript, etc
i would recommend purging all cache, get the NOSCRIPT plugin, disable cookies, etc
the only susupect vectors into an ubuntu system right now are all the browser related things
i am not convinced though - still looks like a mouse slip to me :)
